showScoreExcerpt:
"Which is why this production rests on the very capable shoulders of Ramin Karimloo (Nick Arnstein). In this new hodge podge of a script (with revisions by Harvey Fierstein), Nicky Arnstein has been given a larger presence in the story. Originally, Nicky was a sidebar. Now he is a driving force. From the moment he enters, we cannot take our eyes off of him. To be sure he is very easy on the eyes. More importantly there is something going on inside him that pulls us in."
